Built with ♥ by James

Daniel McKinley's SS15 shot by Chloé Le Drezen for Dazed & Confused

Hollie Ward’s British woven denim

Hyde is a support network for emerging creatives. It's the next step when you want to do your own thing, be your own boss and sell your own work. If you want to follow your own vision not sit behind a desk creating work someone else will claim is their vision.

We also operate as the platform. With our pop-up in Shoreditch in September and October we will sell the work of the most interesting emerging creatives we have come in contact with. After that we will be launching the only online creative department store worth visiting.

For more information, please sign up to our mailing list. To register your interest in working with us email info@hydecreative.co.uk

© HYDE Creative Limited 2015
